laboratory_examinations.findings: Focally increased 18F-FDG uptakes around the supraclavicular region, increased uptakes in bilateral supraclavicular lymph nodes, cervical esophagus, and cervical paraesophageal lymph nodes. Enhanced wall thickening of the cervical esophagus was also noted.
Flat lesion with irregular mucosal surface in the cervical esophagus consistent with T1 cancer.
Diagnosis of squamous cell carcinoma with submucosal invasion.
